metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15807 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel before 5.1.13, there is a memory leak in drivers/scsi/libsas/sas_expander.c when SAS expander discovery fails. This will cause a BUG and denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15807` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-159-generic - 4.4.0-159.187
